title: I am a PIM System Integrator
description: I am a PIM system integrator or partner who manage Akeneo projects. For my customers, I want to get access to the Enterprise licence, manage the cloud instance or get access to the support.

get-source-code.title: Manage the access to the PIM Enterprise archive and extensions
get-source-code.description: I start an Akeneo project and I want to get the archive from the Enterprise Repository to install it and start to develop.

manage-flexibility-instance.title: Set up and manage the access of a Flexibility cloud instance
manage-flexibility-instance.description: I want to set up the customer instance, and manage the accesses to the instance server

manage-serenity-instance.title: Set up a Serenity cloud instance
manage-serenity-instance.description: I want to set up a serenity instance.

manage-onboarder-instance.title: Set up an Onboarder cloud instance
manage-onboarder-instance.description: I want to set up an onboarder instance.

support-access.title: Get Helpdesk access
support-access.description: Manage the access to the Akeneo Helpdesk for your team.

franklin-insights.title: Connect to Franklin Insights
franklin-insights.description: I want to access to Franklin Insights
